column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=I like to help Mom bake cakes .
#text=Mom decided she was going to make a chocolate cake , and chocolate is my favorite !
#text=First , we washed our hands carefully with plenty of soap .
#text=The first thing we had to do was sift the dry ingredients .
#text=Mom got out a really big mixing bowl made of aluminum .
#text=We put in the flour , sugar , salt , and baking powder .
#text=Mom likes turbinado sugar the best because it 's more healthy , so we used that .
#text=The four was King Arthur cake flour .
#text=We blended the dry ingredients carefully with a whip .
#text=Then we got another bowl and mixed the eggs , milk , and butter .
#text=Mom took a little pan and melted the chocolate on the stove on very low heat .
#text=We mixed the chocolate with the liquids and then poured it all into the big bowl .
#text=We baked the cake for 40 minutes -- it seemed like a long time !
#text=-- and after it cooled we iced it and ate some .
